title: Illaoi's E is possibly the most annoying ability in the game.
body: The de-buff lasts way to long I think, and tentacle assists don't count towards the removal, making it really hard for supports to get rid of the de-buff. She doesn't seem too OP apart from that though.

replies.body: It does have a little counterplay, a LITTLE. If she's smacking on your soul, if you jump on her then your soul disappears faster and plus she'll be distracted and will have to choose over hitting you or your soul

Yeah I agree, it just becomes problematic when she's a little ahead or has small minion advantage. She can E you, as like a "fight me bitch", and you have to chose between de-buff or bad trade. I think duration should be nerfed to like 30 seconds from 60.
I don't mind it you can go under tower and just kill the tentacles as they spawn the bad thing is if you and your soul get hit at the same time from q

Got souled and Harsh lessoned then Tentacle smashed and got hit by 3 Tentacles when fully {{item:3071}} cleaved as Zed.

Holy f-cking sh-t not doing that again.
IS THE DURATION OF THE VESSEL DEBUFF 60 SECONDS?!?!?!!?

Yeah, so OP :(  

_"...and marking them as a Vessel, causing them to spawn a Tentacle every 10 seconds for the next 60 seconds."_

Read more [here](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Illaoi) if you're interested.
